intent.user_query: What is the average number of days between repeat purchases for customers who made more than one purchase?

phases.goal: Execute SQL query on fitness_db: SELECT AVG(DaysBetween) AS AverageDaysBetweenPurchases FROM (SELECT s.CustomerID, SaleDate, LAG(SaleDate, 1, NULL) OVER (PARTITION BY s.CustomerID ORDER BY SaleDate) AS PreviousSaleDate, SaleDate - LAG(SaleDate, 1, NULL) OVER (PARTITION BY s.CustomerID ORDER BY SaleDate) AS DaysBetween FROM fitness_db.Sales s) AS Subquery WHERE PreviousSaleDate IS NOT NULL;

arguments.sql: SELECT AVG(DaysBetween) AS AverageDaysBetweenPurchases FROM (SELECT s.CustomerID, SaleDate, LAG(SaleDate, 1, NULL) OVER (PARTITION BY s.CustomerID ORDER BY SaleDate) AS PreviousSaleDate, SaleDate - LAG(SaleDate, 1, NULL) OVER (PARTITION BY s.CustomerID ORDER BY SaleDate) AS DaysBetween FROM fitness_db.Sales s) AS Subquery WHERE PreviousSaleDate IS NOT NULL;

phases.goal: Generate the final report based on the query results.
